title: Welcome to My Simple Blog
content:
This is the first blog post on my new blog platform. I'm excited to share my thoughts, ideas, and experiences with you.

This blog is built with Next.js and features a clean, minimalist design that focuses on content. I hope you enjoy reading my posts as much as I enjoy writing them.

Stay tuned for more content coming soon!

title: Getting Started with Next.js
content:
Next.js is a powerful React framework that makes it easy to build modern web applications. In this post, I'll share some tips for getting started.

## Key Features

- Server-side rendering
- Static site generation
- API routes
- File-based routing

These features make Next.js an excellent choice for building blogs, e-commerce sites, and other web applications.

## Getting Started

To create a new Next.js project, simply run:

```bash
npx create-next-app@latest
```

Follow the prompts, and you'll have a new Next.js project ready to go!

title: The Art of Minimalist Design
content:
Minimalist design is about stripping away the unnecessary and focusing on what truly matters. In web design, this means:

- Clean layouts with plenty of white space
- Thoughtful typography
- Purposeful use of color
- Clear navigation

When done right, minimalist design creates a calm, focused experience that allows your content to shine. It's not about removing everythingâ€”it's about removing everything that doesn't serve a purpose.

Remember: less is more, but only when that 'less' is carefully chosen.
